text:
Don't you dare act surprised Canada...

Some Toronto-area mosques remain open despite dire warnings about the Chinese coronavirus

For years, I have been reporting on the hate being preached in Toronto now media acts "shocked" they aren't closing? WAKE UP
https://t.co/ZwePEfbkln https://t.co/poaeQR0BRf
